title.content: Backlink Audit: Analyze Your Backlink Profile | Semrush

metaDescription.content: Conduct comprehensive backlink audit and get actionable insights on how to improve your backlink profile. Remove or disavow toxic links, monitor changes and secure your link-building efforts.

content.html:
Backlink Audit

Keep your backlink profile healthy!
Already registered? Log in

Insights

Personal recommendations to improve your backlink profile

Toxicity score

This score is based on the number of suspicious domains linking to your website

Actions

Check the quality of every link. Create a list of links to remove or disavow and reach out from the tool

Actions

Check the quality of every link. Create a list of links to remove or disavow and reach out from the tool

Everything you need for a complete Backlink Audit

Audit your backlink health from all sides

  • •
    Investigate the quality of backlinks through 50+ parameters
  • •
    Group referring domains by metrics like IP, category or link type
  • •
    Check for good distribution of anchors and Authority Score

Manage suspicious links that could hurt your rankings

  • •
    Contact site owners right from the tool
  • •
    Send backlinks to your Disavow list
  • •
    Upload the Disavow file from Semrush to Google

Keep all your backlink data in one place

  • •
    Audit backlinks from the Semrush database
  • •
    Connect your Google Search Console account
  • •
    Import backlinks directly from a Majestic account or file

Monitor any significant changes

  • •
    Receive alerts about new, broken, and lost backlinks
  • •
    Keep your eye on any spikes and drops
  • •
    Instantly catch possible spam attacks or Google penalties

Key features of the Backlink Audit tool

  • 50+ evaluation parameters
  • Actionable Insights
  • AI-based Toxicity score
  • Built-in disavow workflow
  • New, lost, and broken backlink data
  • Error alerts for your target pages
  • New target page alerts
  • Outreach flow with site owners' email data
  • Automated updates and alerts about changes

Check your backlink profile’s health now!

Already registered? Log in

FAQ

Why Backlink Audit is important?

What metrics are available for each backlink in the tool?

What does the Semrush Toxicity score mean?

How often is the data in the Backlink Audit Tool updated?
